extDescription.message: DNS Flusher for Chrome: one click to clear DNS cache.

optionDescription.message: Reload current page after refreshing DNS cache.

attentionDescription.message: Command-line flag "--enable-net-benchmarking" must be used to start chrome. PS: If you've started chrome not by below ways, please quit it first, then open it by below ways.

addressBarReloadTips.message: You can also input `reload` into address bar, and press `tab` , and input the url you want to reload(if the url is empty, it will reload current page), then press `enter` to redirect to the url.

defaultTitle.message: Click to clear dns and reload
